explanation: metal_irq_handle: metal_softirq_dispatch directly calls metal_irq_handle. To determine whether metal_softirq_dispatch is (indirectly) recursive under MISRA C (no direct or indirect self-calls), you must inspect metal_irq_handle’s implementation and its transitive callees to see whether any call path leads back to metal_softirq_dispatch (or to another function that eventually calls it). No other symbols (e.g. callers of metal_irq_handle) are required for detecting a cycle originating from metal_softirq_dispatch; only metal_irq_handle and any functions it calls transitively need examination.
